players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Charlie was found dead last night, which means the mafia is among us. We need to be very careful and observe everyone's behavior closely to figure out who it is."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. We should all share our thoughts and any observations to help identify the mafia."
Diana: "I noticed Alice has been silent both times. Silence can be suspicious in a game like this. Alice, do you have any thoughts on who might be the mafia?"
Bob: "I think Alice's silence is very suspicious. We need to hear from her before we vote."
